modelIdentification.name: SISO-STD-001.1-2015 - Real-time Platform Reference Switches FOM Module
modelIdentification.purpose: The RPR FOM supports interoperability for real-time, platform oriented defense simulation.
modelIdentification.description: This module contains the switches, required by the HLA standard to be part of a complete FOM.

reference.identification: Standard for Guidance, Rationale, and Interoperability Modalities for the Real-time Platform Reference Federation Object Model (RPR FOM) SISO-STD-001-2015 10 August 2015
IEEE Standard for Distributed Interactive Simulation - Application Protocols IEEE Std 1278.1-1995 September 21, 1995
IEEE Standard for Distributed Interactive Simulation - Application Protocols IEEE Std 1278.1a-1998 19 March 1998
